definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: In witness whereof the parties hereto have put their hands the day and year first above written.
sentences.chinese: 雙方已於文首載明的日期簽署本協議，以資證明。

sentences.english: In witness whereof, the undersigned Plenipotentiaries, duly authorized, have signed the present Treaty.
sentences.chinese: 下列正式受權的全權代表簽署本條約以資證明。

sentences.english: I like writing, but Iwouldn't take it as my career.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡協作但不願以資爲生業。

sentences.english: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned have executed this Agreement as of the day and year first above written.
sentences.chinese: 下方簽字人已於文首書明日期簽署本協議，以資證明。
